RaMP 3.0.2
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    show(<RaMP>) RaMP() listRaMPVersions()

    Connection to a RaMP database

    createRaMPInput()

    Produce RaMP input from metabolite metadata data.frame object or .csv/.xlsx files

    filterEnrichResults()

    Filter enrichment results by p-value cutoff for display and clustering

    findCluster()

    Perform fuzzy multiple linkage partitioning clustering on pathways identified by Fisher's test

    getAnalyteFromPathway()

    Use fast search algorithm to find all pathways from given analytes

    getChemClass()

    Returns chemical class information comparing a metabolite subset to a larger metabolite population.

    getChemicalProperties()

    Returns chemical properties given a metabolite list

    getCurrentRaMPSourceDBVersions()

    Retrieve versions of each database within the current version of RaMP

    getCurrentRaMPVersion()

    Retrieve RaMP version

    getEntityCountsFromSourceDBs()

    Retrieve counts of entitites (e.g. Metabolites, Pathways, Metabolite-Pathway associations, etc.) for RaMP source databases

    getMetaFromOnto()

    function that query database to find mets in given ontologies

    getMetabChemClass()

    Returns chemical classes for classType

    getMetabClassTypes()

    Returns class categories for metabolites

    getOntoFromMeta()

    Function that query database to find ontology information based on the given list of metabolites

    getOntologies()

    Returns list of available ontologies from database

    getPathwayFromAnalyte()

    Function that search analytes (gene or compounds) or a list of analytes and returns associated pathways

    getPathwayNameList()

    Retrieve list of pathway names

    getPrefixesFromAnalytes()

    Query to retrieve database ID prefixes for analyte types

    getRaMPAnalyteIntersections()

    Retrieve RaMP Analyte Source Intersections, these indicate the level of analyte overlaps between our sources

    getReactionClassesForAnalytes()

    getReactionClassesForAnalytes returns reactions class and EC numbers for a collection of input compound ids

    getReactionDetails()

    getReactionDetails returns general reaction information for a list of reaction ids. This utility methed can help extend information from previous queries. For instance, if a user queries for reactions related to a list of analytes, or filtered on reactions, this method can be used to return general reaction info on some subset of reaction ids of interest.

    getReactionParticipants()

    getReactionParticipants returns protein information for a list of reaction ids. This utility method can help extend information from previous queries. For instance, if a user queries for reactions related to a list of metabolites, this method can be used to return proteins on some subset of reaction ids to find related proteins.

    getReactionsForAnalytes()

    getReactionsForAnalytes returns all associated reactions for a collection of input compound ids

    getRheaAnalyteReactionAssociations()

    getAnalyteReactionAssociations returns mets associated with input proteins, and proteins associated with input metabolites Associations are made through shared Rhea reactions

    get_remote_db_version_list()

    List RaMP db versions

    listAvailableRaMPDbVersions()

    Lists local and remotely available RaMP SQLite DB versions and prompts with message to download a new version if one exists.

    pathwayResultsPlot() chemicalClassSurvey() chemicalClassEnrichment() FilterFishersResults() write_FishersResults() runCombinedFisherTest()

    deprecated functions - to be removed in RaMP 4.0

    plotAnalyteOverlapPerRxnLevel()

    Plots an interactive upset plot of overlapping input compounds at reaction class level 1

    plotCataNetwork()

    Plots a network based on gene-metabolite relationships

    plotChemicalClass()

    Plots an interactive sunburst plot of chemical classes

    plotOntologyEnrichmentResults()

    Cluster and plot significant ontologies by FDR-adjusted pVal

    plotPathwayResults()

    Cluster and plot significant pathways by FDR-adjusted pVal

    plotReactionClasses()

    Plots an interactive sunburst plot of reaction class

    rampFastCata()

    Retrieves analytes that involved in same reaction as input metabolite

    removeLocalRampDB()

    Remove a RaMP database version from local file cache

    runEnrichChemClass()

    Returns chemical class information comparing a metabolite subset to a metabolite population, including Fisher Exact Test enrichment p-values and FDR values.

    runEnrichOntologies()

    Enrichment analysis for metabolite ontology mappings

    runEnrichPathways()

    Do fisher test for only one pathway from search result clicked on highchart

    runEnrichReactionClass()

    Enrichment analysis for analyte-reaction class mappings

    runQuery()

    Get results from an SQL query to a RaMP database

    writeFishersResults()

    Function that writes Fishers Test results, after clustering to a CSV file

    writePathwaysToCSV()

    Function that writes output from getPathwayFromAnalyte() to a CSV file

    Contents

    Developed by Andrew Patt, Ewy Mathe, Khyati Mehta.
